channel.title: Works on Blake Braun
channel.description: Recent content in Works on Blake Braun

item.title: My Work
item.description:
Click to download my resume.

As the Vice President of Administration for the Delta Delta chapter of Alpha Phi Omega, I completely redesigned the chapter website, making it more visually appealing and easier to navigate.

In addition, I also maintain the Alpha Phi Omega - Delta Delta Facebook page.


As a ‘Be a Billiken Blogger’ for Saint Louis University’s Division of Marketing & Communications, I provide a current student’s perspective on undergraduate life at the University for prospective students. Click to view my personal blog for the University.

For a newswriting course, I maintain a blog related to topics in the university community as well as general tips on newswriting as a practice.

In addition, for fun, I created a Snapchat filter that is active on the campus of Saint Louis University.
